Detailed Description

Indicates success or failure of OBEX API functions and operations.

This class defines an implicit conversion to BOOLEAN where 'TRUE' indicates success whereas 'FALSE' means that an error has occured. In the latter case, GetErrorCode() can be used to obtain more specific information on the error cause.

Default-constructed instances indicate an 'Unspecified' error. Use the named constructor Ok() to obtain an ObexResult object that means success.
